<script>
(function IIFE(dataLayer) {
	var mySearchExperience = isSearch() ? "" : window.localStorage.getItem('search_algorithm');
    var searchAlgorithm = isSearchRelatedPage() ? mySearchExperience || 'none' : 'none';
    dataLayer.push({
            "talentNetworkDID": "TNHV0NZ6JLYRVGX9JC4H",
            "companyName": "Stryker",
            "clientCountry": "US",
            "template_ID": "premium",
            "search_experience": searchAlgorithm
    });
})(window.dataLayer);


function isSearch() {
    return window.location.href.match(/\/search/g)
}
function isSearchRelatedPage() {
    if(window.location.href.match(/\/job\//g)) {
        return document.referrer.match(/\/search/g);
    }

    return window.location.href.match(/\/search|\/ApplyFinish\//g)
}
</script>

        <!-- JDP Media Section-->
        <div id="jdp-media-content-section" class="hidden-sm hidden-xs">
            
        </div>
        <!-- About Us -->
        <div id="jdp-about-us-section" class="hidden-sm hidden-xs">
            
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Left Column -->
    <div class="jdp-left-column col-md-8 col-md-pull-4">
        <!-- Job Description -->
        <div id="jdp-job-description-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-description-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Description</h2>
    Who we want<br /><br />Challengers. People who seek out the hard projects and work to find just the right solutions.<br />Teammates. Partners who listen to ideas, share thoughts and work together to move the business forward.<br />Charismatic networkers. Relationship-savvy people who intentionally make connections with both internal partners and external contacts.<br />Strategic thinkers. Interns who propose innovative ideas and consistently exceed their performance objectives.<br />Customer-oriented achievers. Individuals with an unparalleled work ethic and customer-focused attitude who bring value to their partnerships.<br />Game changers. Persistent interns who will stop at nothing to live out Stryker‚Äôs mission to make healthcare better. <br /><br />What You Get Out of the Internship<br /><br />Stryker, a global leader in medical technology takes great pride in their people, and that‚Äôs why we‚Äôre looking to expand our talent. As a result, we are looking for the best and brightest students to strengthen our team and drive our business going forward. Stryker Engineering interns will get to:<br /> <br />‚Ä¢ Impact the development and manufacturing of cutting edge products<br />‚Ä¢ Gain experience within a fast paced and growing industry<br />‚Ä¢ Apply classroom knowledge in a fast-paced and growing industry setting<br />‚Ä¢ Implement new ideas, be constantly challenged, and develop your skills<br /><br />Opportunities Available<br /><br />As an Engineer intern at Stryker, you will be placed in one of the following teams:<br /> <br />Quality-<br /><br /><u>Advanced </u><u>Quality ‚Äì</u><br />AQE interns work on engineering projects related to development of new products. Areas of emphasis may include human factors engineering, risk management, application of statistics, reliability engineering, design verification, and design validation including customer interaction. As Homer Stryker pointed out, ‚ÄúIf your tools don‚Äôt work, make them work. If you can‚Äôt make them work, make some that do work.‚Äù In this directive, the AQE team works to make sure that the products we develop at Stryker will work consistently for our customers to meet or exceed their expectations. <br /> <br />(Majors Targeted: ME, EE, BME, CS, Computer Engineering)<br /><br /><u>Process Quality ‚Äì </u><br />PQE Interns collaborate with cross-functional teams to support product sustainment. When non-conforming issues arise in production, it is our responsibility to perform robust root cause analysis and implement effective corrective actions. Do you enjoy deep dive investigations and driving collaboration and communication to achieve issue resolution? If so, you may be a great fit for this team! PQE interns are focused on quality, compliance and continuous improvement. They use their education to work with a variety of tools including CAD for fixture design, root cause analysis methods, LabView, and validation activities to optimize production, inspection, and quality system processes. <br /> <br /><u>Supplier </u><u>Quality </u><br />SQE Interns are responsible for all things supplier-related. Stryker uses a number of critical suppliers to manufacture components and finished products, and to provide critical services. Our job is to work closely with the suppliers to ensure components and their manufacturing processes meet our required standards. Do you enjoy using your technical background and communication skills to influence suppliers? If so, you might be a great fit for this diverse and talented team! The role requires working closely with internal customers from multiple functions, meeting with suppliers frequently, and the use of both technical and business skills. <br /><br /><u>Quality</u><br />Quality interns work with our internal cross-functional teams and external sales team and customers to ensure we develop and sustain a product with the highest quality. Our job is to ensure we develop the right products up front ‚Äì evaluate risk, ensure our customer‚Äôs user needs are met, and help drive craftsmanship, safety, durability and reliability into the product. On the post-market side, we also work closely with regulatory to handle any complaints and implement design changes, as needed, to address quality issues. The role requires someone who has great communication, problem-solving, and technical skills. <br /><br />(Majors Targeted: ME, EE, BME, IE, CE, Materials Science Engineering)<br /><br />Research & Development-<br /><br /><u>New </u><u>Product Development</u><br />R&D Interns in New Product Development work with cross-functional teams to identify the needs and the goals of future products. They research new technologies, customer expectations, business requirements and regulations. They may work with a variety of tools, including CAD, FEA, and our Test Labs to develop new product concepts. Our interns utilize their technical education to design new products and drive them from concept to production. <br /><br /><u>Product Engineering</u><br />R&D Interns in Product Engineering work with cross-functional teams to identify the greatest needs for improvements on current products. They research new technologies, customer feedback, and product performance data to make our products better for Stryker and for our customers. Product Engineering interns work with a variety of tools, including CAD, FEA, Test Labs, and root cause analysis methods. Our interns utilize their technical education to improve the safety and efficacy of our existing products.<br /> <br />(Majors Targeted: ME, EE, CS, Software and Biomechanical Engineering)<br /><br />Test Lab-<br />Test interns partner closely with Test Engineers and R&D to experiment with early prototypes and vet out product designs throughout the design process. What this really means is that we get to be the Mythbusters of our division. You think your design can last the entire expected service life? We put it to the test. Just like the show, we quickly design and build fixtures to simulate real life situations. In addition to these experiments, we are ultimately responsible for design verification ‚Äì the quantitative testing of the technical specifications of the product. A team‚Äôs experience ranges from 2 to over 15 years with technical specialties ranging from sterilization, mechanical, electrical, software, and optics. If you‚Äôre the type of person that has the magic ability to break things ‚Äì we want you!<br /> <br />(Majors Targeted: EE, CS, CE, ME, BME)<br /><br />Manufacturing - <br />Manufacturing Engineers will collaborate with Design and Operations to deliver best-in-class new products to market. Interns will partner with technicians and engineers to improve Stryker‚Äôs manufacturing lines through new fixture development, assembly line process enhancement, implementation of lean manufacturing principles, and improving ergonomics and safety. <br /><br />(Majors targeted: ME, EE, BME, Operations/Industrial/Manufacturing Engineering)<br /><br />
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Job Requirements -->
        <div id="jdp-job-requirements-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-requirements-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Requirements</h2>
    <p>What You Need<br /><br />‚Ä¢ Currently working on completion of Bachelor‚Äôs degree in related field or equivalent; we will only consider students who plan be enrolled in a degree-seeking program after the summer<br />‚Ä¢ Cumulative 3.0 GPA or above; must be the case at the date of hire and also will be verified during background check in the spring<br />‚Ä¢ Must be permanent resident of the U.S. or U.S. citizen<br />‚Ä¢ Excellent written and verbal communication skills<br />‚Ä¢ Strong organizational, problem-solving, and analytical skills; able to manage priorities and workflow<br />‚Ä¢ Versatility, flexibility, and a willingness to work within constantly changing priorities with enthusiasm<br />‚Ä¢ Ability to exercise independent judgment<br />‚Ä¢ Proficient on basic computer programs: Microsoft Excel, Word, PowerPoint<br />‚Ä¢ Proven leadership and business acumen skills<br />‚Ä¢ Proven ability to handle multiple projects and meet deadlines<br />‚Ä¢ Strong interpersonal skills<br /> </p>
</div>

        </div>

    <!-- GTM Data Layer -->
<script>var dataLayer = [];</script>
<!-- End GTM Data Layer -->
<script>
(function IIFE(dataLayer) {
	var mySearchExperience = isSearch() ? "" : window.localStorage.getItem('search_algorithm');
    var searchAlgorithm = isSearchRelatedPage() ? mySearchExperience || 'none' : 'none';
    dataLayer.push({
            "talentNetworkDID": "TNHV0NZ6JLYRVGX9JC4H",
            "companyName": "Stryker",
            "clientCountry": "US",
            "template_ID": "premium",
            "search_experience": searchAlgorithm
    });
})(window.dataLayer);


function isSearch() {
    return window.location.href.match(/\/search/g)
}
function isSearchRelatedPage() {
    if(window.location.href.match(/\/job\//g)) {
        return document.referrer.match(/\/search/g);
    }

    return window.location.href.match(/\/search|\/ApplyFinish\//g)
}
</script>

               ng-model="locationInput" ng-change="getSuggestions()" placeholder="City or Postal Code">
        <ul id="suggestions" class="list-group autocomplete-list suggestions-list" role="list" ng-show="locationSuggestions.length > 0" ng-cloak>
            <li ng-repeat="location in locationSuggestions" class="blockSpan list-group-item" ng-click="addToSelectedTags($index)"
                ng-mouseover="$parent.selectedIndex=$index" ng-class="{active : selectedIndex===$index}">{{$parent.googlePlacesAutocompleteEnabled ? location.description : location}}</li>
            <li ng-repeat-end class="autocompletefooter" ng-if="googlePlacesAutocompleteEnabled"><img src='/public/cms_base/img/powered_by_google_on_white.png' align='right'class='google-footer'></li>
        </ul>

        <!-- Job Description -->
        <div id="jdp-job-description-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-description-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Description</h2>
    Handle all incoming customer and field service calls, robotic part requests, complete order entry and in turn facilitate shipments and required returns productively and efficiently with minimal supervision. Provide logistics support to all sales and field personnel for Capital sales and transfers for domestic and international sites. Manage ECN and Quality requirements.<br />‚Ä¢ Enter sales orders for robotic parts for all external customers; Stryker Sales, Stryker Affiliates, Field Service Engineers (FSEs), and internal requests into the Expandable System <br />‚Ä¢ Maintain knowledge of software versions of the robotic systems to ensure accuracy of ordering parts.<br />‚Ä¢ Coordinate with Planning, Materials and Distribution Team to ensure timely shipment of instruments.<br />‚Ä¢ Process QA complaints; creating RMA‚Äôs and execute RMA procedures when needed, including follow up of returns and processing replacement parts.<br />‚Ä¢ Manage all system field upgrades through future CAPA‚Äôs and ECN‚Äôs for products release, maintaining ECN requirements, creating sales orders, work orders/cases and creating spread sheets for tracking.<br />‚Ä¢ Manage logistics of capital sales equipment and maintain the movement of capital inventory.<br />‚Ä¢ Manage movement of all inventory through our Distribution centers (Millstone and Kenco system).<br />
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Job Requirements -->
        <div id="jdp-job-requirements-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-requirements-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Requirements</h2>
    ‚Ä¢ 3+ years of experience in an administrative role<br />‚Ä¢ Demonstrates ability to work independently and use sound judgment to exercise independent decision-making skills.<br />‚Ä¢ Demonstrates communication and interpersonal skills ‚Äì consistently focused on customer (internal/external) satisfaction.<br />‚Ä¢ Demonstrates Knowledge and experience in shipments of products, both domestic and international highly desired.<br />‚Ä¢ Demonstrates proficiency using MS Word, Excel, Outlook, and ERP systems.<br />
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Desktop Apply Now Section-->
        <div id="jdp-bottom-apply-section">

function isSearch() {
    return window.location.href.match(/\/search/g)
}
function isSearchRelatedPage() {
    if(window.location.href.match(/\/job\//g)) {
        return document.referrer.match(/\/search/g);
    }

    return window.location.href.match(/\/search|\/ApplyFinish\//g)
}

<small ><i><strong><u>IMPORTANT NOTE TO JOB APPLICANTS:</u></strong>  POTENTIAL FRAUD ALERT.  Stryker has become aware of a fraud where unknown entities are posing as Stryker recruiters in an attempt to obtain personal information from individuals as part of our application or job offer process.  Before providing any personal information to outside parties, please verify the following: A) all legitimate Stryker recruiter email addresses end with ‚Äú@stryker.com‚Äù and  B) the position described is found on our careers site at careers.stryker.com.</i></small>

                            <span class="jdp-title-job-location">Fort Lauderdale, FL </span>
                            <span class="jdp-title-job-at">at </span><span class="jdp-title-job-company">Stryker </span></h1>

        <!-- JDP Media Section-->
        <div id="jdp-media-content-section" class="hidden-sm hidden-xs">
            
        </div>
        <!-- About Us -->
        <div id="jdp-about-us-section" class="hidden-sm hidden-xs">
            
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Left Column -->
    <div class="jdp-left-column col-md-8 col-md-pull-4">
        <!-- Job Description -->
        <div id="jdp-job-description-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-description-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Description</h2>
    Responsible for maintaining customer satisfaction, providing both verbal and written clinical and application support to end users, Field Service Engineers, Mako Product Specialist, Sales personnel, and International Distributors. Works with other departments to ensure that current and future products meet all end user requirements. Resolves customer satisfaction issues by providing solutions to complex clinical application issues.<ul><li>Respond to clinical application questions and support requests from Field Service Engineers (FSE), Mako Product Specialist (MPS), Customer Service Representatives (CSR), Sales, and International Distributors via telephone, email or in-person.</li><li>As a certified MPS level specialist, provides on-site surgical support to MPS & engineering teams as necessary.</li><li>Collaborates directly with Engineering and QA/RA departments to resolve open CAPAs and Complaints. Coordinates with department manager to communicate resolutions to customers.</li><li>Provides input to and acts on Customer Support‚Äôs behalf on new or improved products and applications.</li><li>Oversees development of in-house segmentation project.</li><li>Identifying and development of required test fixtures and procedures.</li><li>Identifies and effectively communicates surgeon and staff training needs. Assists training department in the development of training programs as required.</li><li>Assist in the development of and provide content to web based knowledge base system for domestic and international customers.</li><li>Documents and provides Voice-Of-Customer input to Marketing / Customer Advocate Team Manager.</li><li>Provide support at industry trade shows and road show demonstrations as required.</li><li>Represent the end users in the verification and validation processes of new product and software releases.</li><li>Monitor surgical case reports and communicate any problem areas or suggestions for product or support improvement to necessary departments/teams through regularly scheduled QC meetings.</li><li>In coordination with Department Manager, support new product releases ensuring successful launch.</li><li>Act as an observer on all ECN releases, keeping product performance and overall applications in mind.</li><li>Develop and maintain a detailed working knowledge of all implant medical devices for purposes of providing comprehensive support to all users.</li><li>Collaborate with training department to ensure continuous updating of basic product application skills.</li><li>Meet with department manager on a regular basis to review major activities, sensitive issues, and progress towards department objectives.</li><li>As required, assist with special tasks. These may include helping to solve complex domestic or international support related issues.</li></ul>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Job Requirements -->
        <div id="jdp-job-requirements-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-requirements-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Requirements</h2>
    <ul><li>Bachelor‚Äôs degree in related field, or an equivalent combination of education and experience</li><li>3+ years as a clinical specialist or application support specialist</li><li>Experience in the orthopedic implant or robotics industry preferred, but not required.</li><li>Demonstrated a high degree of technical proficiency, excellent problem solving skills, and analytical ability.</li><li>Demonstrated verbal communication skills (both in groups and one-on-on interaction) and teaching skills.</li></ul>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Desktop Apply Now Section-->
        <div id="jdp-bottom-apply-section">
            <div class="jdp-bottom-apply-card content-card">
    <div class="row">
        <div id="jdp-bottom-apply-company-logo-col" class="col-sm-3">
            
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-3 col-md-5"></div>
        <div id="jdp-bottom-apply-button-col" class="col-sm-6 col-md-4">
            <div id="jdp-apply-section-bottom" class="jdp-apply-section">
    <a id="jdp-apply-button-bottom" ng-click="registerApplyStartEvent($event)" ng-href="{{ applyURL }}"
       class="primary-button block-element">Apply</a>
    <a id="jdp-not-ready-to-apply-link-bottom" href="/en-US/join" class="jdp-join-link">Not ready to Apply?</a>
</div>

        </div>
    </div>

However, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the contractor‚Äôs legal duty to furnish information.</p>

(function IIFE(dataLayer) {
	var mySearchExperience = isSearch() ? "" : window.localStorage.getItem('search_algorithm');
    var searchAlgorithm = isSearchRelatedPage() ? mySearchExperience || 'none' : 'none';
    dataLayer.push({
            "talentNetworkDID": "TNHV0NZ6JLYRVGX9JC4H",
            "companyName": "Stryker",
            "clientCountry": "US",
            "template_ID": "premium",
            "search_experience": searchAlgorithm
    });
})(window.dataLayer);


function isSearch() {
    return window.location.href.match(/\/search/g)
}
function isSearchRelatedPage() {
    if(window.location.href.match(/\/job\//g)) {
        return document.referrer.match(/\/search/g);
    }

    return window.location.href.match(/\/search|\/ApplyFinish\//g)
}
</script>

    <!-- Left Column -->
    <div class="jdp-left-column col-md-8 col-md-pull-4">
        <!-- Job Description -->
        <div id="jdp-job-description-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-description-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Description</h2>
    As an application software engineer at Stryker, you will design, develop and maintain software for robotic-assisted surgery products. You will collaborate with peers in software engineering, software quality assurance, and project and product management to define and develop software that meets customer and system requirements. Following defined design practices and the use of sound software engineering principles, you will ensure that application software products are safe, robust, and user friendly.<br /><br /><strong>Responsibilities</strong><ul><li>Function as a Subject Matter Expert in one or more areas of the application</li><li>Lead or own one or more areas of the Software Development Lifecycle</li><li>Provide mentorship and technical guidance to more junior engineers</li><li>Maintain and improve existing engineering methods and practices</li><li>Work as part of a team using established procedures for Agile Software Development</li><li>Independently design and implement complex concepts and maintain existing code in Tcl/Tk and C/C++</li><li>Participate in software planning and estimating activities</li><li>Identify root causes of issues and determine potential solutions</li><li>Participate in verification and validation activities</li><li>Follow the company‚Äôs quality process</li></ul>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Job Requirements -->
        <div id="jdp-job-requirements-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-requirements-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Requirements</h2>
    <strong>Requirements</strong><ul><li>Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science and seven years of industry experience in professional software development, or bachelor‚Äôs degree and additional years of experience. </li><li>Proven domain expertise in software modeling, analysis, and design. </li><li><strong>Required Technical Competencies: </strong>Strong fundamentals in algorithms and data structures; object oriented design and analysis; software design, development and verification methodologies; C++ development; principles of computer architecture, operating systems and computer networking; use of software development tools such as compliers, interpreters, programming editors, debuggers, source code control, defect management. </li><li><strong>Preferred Technical Competencies:</strong> Proficiency with an interpreted language (such as Python); background in 3D graphics and geometry; Linux-based software development skills; experience of software development in a regulated industry.</li></ul>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Desktop Apply Now Section-->
        <div id="jdp-bottom-apply-section">
            <div class="jdp-bottom-apply-card content-card">

	var mySearchExperience = isSearch() ? "" : window.localStorage.getItem('search_algorithm');

    dataLayer.push({
            "talentNetworkDID": "TNHV0NZ6JLYRVGX9JC4H",

})(window.dataLayer);


function isSearch() {
    return window.location.href.match(/\/search/g)
}
function isSearchRelatedPage() {
    if(window.location.href.match(/\/job\//g)) {
        return document.referrer.match(/\/search/g);
    }

    return window.location.href.match(/\/search|\/ApplyFinish\//g)
}

Stryker has become aware of a fraud where unknown entities are posing as Stryker recruiters in an attempt to obtain personal information from individuals as part of our application or job offer process.  Before providing any personal information to outside parties, please verify the following: A) all legitimate Stryker recruiter email addresses end with ‚Äú@stryker.com‚Äù and  B) the position described is found on our careers site at careers.stryker.com.</i></small>

                            <span class="jdp-title-job-location">Fort Lauderdale, FL </span>
                            <span class="jdp-title-job-at">at </span><span class="jdp-title-job-company">Stryker </span></h1>

        </div>

        <div id="jdp-job-snapshot-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-snapshot-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Snapshot</h2>
    <ul class="snapshot-padding">

        <!-- Discrete Fields -->
        
    </ul>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- JDP Media Section-->
        <div id="jdp-media-content-section" class="hidden-sm hidden-xs">
            
        </div>
        <!-- About Us -->
        <div id="jdp-about-us-section" class="hidden-sm hidden-xs">
            
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Left Column -->
    <div class="jdp-left-column col-md-8 col-md-pull-4">
        <!-- Job Description -->
        <div id="jdp-job-description-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-description-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Description</h2>
    <ul><li>Optimize systems engineering capabilities using knowledge from standard industry practices and regulatory standards</li><li>Provide solutions for improvement of established system design & test development methods</li><li>Responsible for system projects/features in terms of leading cross-function design & integration, flow-down of the documentation (requirements, specifications, protocols, use cases) and planning and conducting integration steps (analysis & tests)</li><li>Apply systems modeling language/tools (Sys ML) to define architecture, behavior, state, data flow, context view and interface description to assist with design and integrations activities.</li><li>As subject matter expert of the MAKOplasty applications, provide technical oversight for the analysis, development, verification and validation of products</li><li>Provide technical guidance and mentorship to team members</li><li>Manage the technical product development activities to ensure timely completion of projects</li><li>Through sound engineering problem-solving techniques, manage and resolve system field issues reported through the complaint process</li><li>Support the engineers during risk assessments and root cause investigations to meet the company metrics for timely handling of complaints and CAPA activities</li><li>Lead and provide technical expertise for the creation of risk management documents (AFMEA, FTA, FMECA).</li><li>Coordinate with program management to establish project scopes, resources needs, priorities and schedules. </li><li>Drive the growth of the team by supporting the recruitment of top performing talents in collaboration with the Manager of System Design</li><li>Develop expert knowledge of regulatory standards applicable to medical device and software development life cycle: 21 CFR part 820, ISO 13485, ISO 14971, IEC 62304, IEC 60601</li><li>Develop expert knowledge of systems engineering principles based on industry practices and guidance from organizations such as INCOSE</li><li>Provide mentorship to the engineers with regards to regulatory standards and application of Stryker‚Äôs quality procedures. </li><li>Oversee system level verification and validation activities including definition of test strategies, development and validation of test methods, execution of protocols, data collection and documentation</li><li>Identify and plan mitigation strategies for project and technical risk. </li><li>Manage technical feature risk retirement activities including analyses, prototyping and feasibility activities</li><li>Develop a strong understanding of the clinical application of Stryker‚Äôs robotic solutions and product line</li><li>Solicit and incorporate the input from surgeons, engineering, sales, marketing, quality assurance and operations to MAKO‚Äôs product lines</li><li>Ensure correctness of documents produced by the team members</li><li>Convey project status to management and team members as needed. </li><li>Articulate issues and make recommendations for improvement to program and executive management as appropriate. </li></ul>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Job Requirements -->
        <div id="jdp-job-requirements-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-requirements-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Requirements</h2>
    <ul><li>Minimum bachelor‚Äôs degree in an engineering discipline, with Systems Engineering specialization as plus, and with at least 6 years of experience </li><li>Minimum of 3 years of experience in a leadership position </li><li>Experience in system of systems with background in medical devices & imaging, robotics, aerospace and/or automotive</li><li>Proficient with systems engineering principles and systems modeling tools </li><li>Experience in software development life cycle processes and AGILE is a plus</li><li>Ability to accurately set and meet dates/times for issue resolutions or updates</li><li>Keen sense of teamwork is highly essential</li><li>Must be extremely detail oriented with strong written, verbal, interpersonal, computer, and organizational skills</li><li>Must have excellent oral, written and interpersonal communication skills</li><li>Must be able and flexible to work well under changing priorities in a high energy and demanding environment. </li><li>Strong knowledge of regulatory standards and quality processes</li><li>Strong leadership, interpersonal, organizational and problem solving skill</li><li>Strong creative thinking skills</li><li>Good customer service and presentation skills</li></ul>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Desktop Apply Now Section-->
        <div id="jdp-bottom-apply-section">
            <div class="jdp-bottom-apply-card content-card">
    <div class="row">
        <div id="jdp-bottom-apply-company-logo-col" class="col-sm-3">
            
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-3 col-md-5"></div>
        <div id="jdp-bottom-apply-button-col" class="col-sm-6 col-md-4">
            <div id="jdp-apply-section-bottom" class="jdp-apply-section">
    <a id="jdp-apply-button-bottom" ng-click="registerApplyStartEvent($event)" ng-href="{{ applyURL }}"
       class="primary-button block-element">Apply</a>
    <a id="jdp-not-ready-to-apply-link-bottom" href="/en-US/join" class="jdp-join-link">Not ready to Apply?</a>

function isSearch() {
    return window.location.href.match(/\/search/g)
}
function isSearchRelatedPage() {
    if(window.location.href.match(/\/job\//g)) {
        return document.referrer.match(/\/search/g);
    }

    return window.location.href.match(/\/search|\/ApplyFinish\//g)
}

            <li ng-repeat="location in locationSuggestions" class="blockSpan list-group-item" ng-click="addToSelectedTags($index)"
                ng-mouseover="$parent.selectedIndex=$index" ng-class="{active : selectedIndex===$index}">{{$parent.googlePlacesAutocompleteEnabled ? location.description : location}}</li>
            <li ng-repeat-end class="autocompletefooter" ng-if="googlePlacesAutocompleteEnabled"><img src='/public/cms_base/img/powered_by_google_on_white.png' align='right'class='google-footer'></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="search-bar-element search-widget-container">
        <a ng-href="{{searchUrl()}}" id="primary-search-button" target="_top" class="search-btn primary-button text-center label-text">Search</a>
    </div>
</div>




                <!-- End Search bar -->
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

Stryker has become aware of a fraud where unknown entities are posing as Stryker recruiters in an attempt to obtain personal information from individuals as part of our application or job offer process.  Before providing any personal information to outside parties, please verify the following: A) all legitimate Stryker recruiter email addresses end with ‚Äú@stryker.com‚Äù and  B) the position described is found on our careers site at careers.stryker.com.</i></small>

        <!-- About Us -->

    <!-- Left Column -->
    <div class="jdp-left-column col-md-8 col-md-pull-4">
        <!-- Job Description -->
        <div id="jdp-job-description-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-description-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Description</h2>
    <p>The engineer is responsible for development and maintenance of the Linux O.S. distribution for Stryker Robotics‚Äô medical devices.</p><ul><li>Works with colleagues to develop requirements and implement solutions for timely delivery of a secure and robust Linux O.S. implementation running on multiple platforms</li><li>Works with colleagues in software engineering to implement library and other support required by the clinical application software</li><li>Works with colleagues to develop and maintain installers for the O.S. and application software</li><li>Monitors O.S. and library vulnerabilities and provides analysis to determine if the product is affected</li><li>Produces O.S. patches to implement fixes for vulnerabilities</li><li>Performs testing of the O.S. distribution</li><li>Provides required documentation according to Stryker design rules</li><li>Keeps up to date on Linux development and knowledge of industry best practices</li><li>Applies Stryker processes and industry standards</li><li>Supports the evaluation of technologies for inclusion in the O.S. distribution</li><li>Independently integrates and administers development tools, including required validation</li><li>Designs and implements solutions to address identified problem</li><li>Represents R&D in cross functional programs and provides direction and observations on internal customer objectives as they involve R&D</li></ul>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Job Requirements -->
        <div id="jdp-job-requirements-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-requirements-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Requirements</h2>
    <ul><li>Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field</li><li>Five years professional experience with Linux development and administration</li><li>Expert knowledge of common Linux packaging mechanisms, such as deb or rpm</li><li>Scripting experience using bash and a common scripting language, such as Python, for task automation and for software installation</li><li>Expert knowledge of computer networking using Linux</li><li>Expert knowledge of common O.S. and application security vulnerabilities and related analysis and testing best practices</li><li>Experience with common software development tools, such as compilers, interpreters, debuggers, source code repository, defect tracking, etc.</li><li>LPI, RHCE, or other standard certification preferred</li><li>Experience with embedded Linux using Buildroot or Yocto is a plus</li><li>Previous experience working with medical devices in a regulated environment is a plus</li></ul>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Desktop Apply Now Section-->
        <div id="jdp-bottom-apply-section">
            <div class="jdp-bottom-apply-card content-card">

        </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function loadJSAsync( ) {
		for ( var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++ ) {
			var url = arguments[i];
			(function() {
				var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
				s.async = true;
				s.src = url;
				el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
			})();
		}
	}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    
    if (typeof window['closureReadyCallbacks'] == 'undefined') {
        window['closureReadyCallbacks'] = [];
    }

    function call_when_jsall_loaded(cb) {
        if (window['closureReady']) {
            cb();
        } else {
            window['closureReadyCallbacks'].push(cb);
        }
    }
</script>

<div id="u_nav">
    <script>

function regExpEscape(s) {
    return String(s).replace(/([-()\[\]{}+?*.$\^|,:#<!\\])/g, '\\$1').
            replace(/\x08/g, '\\x08');
}


function appendParamsOnce(url, params) {
    var useParams = params.replace(/^(\?|\&)/, '');
    if (url.match(new RegExp('[\\?|\\&]' + regExpEscape(useParams))) == null) {
        return url += (url.indexOf('?') > 0 ? '&' : '?' ) + useParams;
    }
    return url;
}

</script>

   <tr valign="top"><td style="padding:20px;padding-left:23px;">

<a tabindex="-1" id="job_header"></a>
<div data-tn-component="jobHeader">
<b class="jobtitle"><font size="+1">Coach for Robotics and Electronics for kids.</font></b>

<br>
<span class="company">DBP ROBOTICS</span>
     -
<span class="location">North Miami Beach, FL 33160</span>
    <div>
        <span class="no-wrap">
                $10 an hour - </span>
        <span class="no-wrap">Part-time</span>
        </div>
</div>
    <table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=0><tr><td class="snip">
<span id="job_summary" class="summary"><p>MIAMI-DADE and BROWARD.</p><p>We are looking for enthusiastic computer engineer and electronic students that likes to have some extra money working as counselors of Robotics, Arduino and Electronics programs in different places around Miami-Dade and Broward.</p><p>We go to private and public schools, community centers, kindergardens, hotels and other places to make our programs with kids from 3 to 12 years old.</p><p>Our programs have different activities like Mini-robotics, Robotics, Basic Electronics, Stop Motion Animation, Coding and Video Game Design.</p><p>We train our staff and have flexible schedules.Coaches must be able to carry at 50 Lbs, show clean fingerprint background, (Level 2) and Valid Driver Licence.</p><p>Job Type: Part-time</p><p>Salary: $10.00 /hour</p></span><br><div id="p_2c26d2088bb43e64">

			    <div>
				    <script type="text/javascript">
				    function RadWindowprompt_detectenter(id, ev, input)
				    {							
					    if (!ev) ev = window.event;                
					    if (ev.keyCode == 13)
					    {															        
					        var but = input.parentNode.parentNode.getElementsByTagName("A")[0];					        
					        if (but)
						    {							
							    if (but.click) but.click();
							    else if (but.onclick)
							    {
							        but.focus(); var click = but.onclick; but.onclick = null; if (click) click.call(but);							 
							    }
						    }
					       return false;
					    } 
					    else return true;
				    }	 
				    </script>
				    <input title="Enter Value" onkeydown="return RadWindowprompt_detectenter('{0}', event, this);" type="text"  class="rwDialogInput" value="{2}" />
			    </div>
			    <div>
				    <a onclick="$find('{0}').close(this.parentNode.parentNode.getElementsByTagName('input')[0].value);"				
					    class="rwPopupButton" href="javascript:void(0);" ><span class="rwOuterSpan"><span class="rwInnerSpan">##LOC[OK]##</span></span></a>
				    <a onclick="$find('{0}').close(null);" class="rwPopupButton"  href="javascript:void(0);"><span class="rwOuterSpan"><span class="rwInnerSpan">##LOC[Cancel]##</span></span></a>

        var Confirm1 = function ()
        {
            var RetVal = confirm("Are you sure you want to empty your job basket?");
            if( RetVal == true )
                SetGridUpdateProgressStatus();
                
            return RetVal;
        }
        var TreeNodeClick = function(sender, args)
        {
            if((sender.Text == "Change Password") || (sender.Text == "Modifier mot de passe") || (sender.Text == "FR-Change Password") )
            {
                //openradwindow('radwindow','#41182A','ChangePassword.aspx',400,400,'change_password.gif','Change Password');
                OpenPopupWindow('ChangePassword.aspx',400,400);
            }
        }

        var NavigationSplitterLoaded = function(sender)
        {
            var Flag = "False";
            if(Flag == "True")
            {
                var pane=sender.getStartPane();
                pane.setVarSize(1);
                pane.set_minWidth(1);
                pane.set_maxWidth(1);
            }
        }

    <!-- Page modified on 30-12-08 to include new splitter control -->
    
    <script type="text/javascript">
		/*<![CDATA[*/
		    var grid = null;
		    var timer = null;
		    var gridpaneloaded = false;
		    var splitter = null;
		    var splitterresizing = false;
		    //This value indicates the description pane is resized for the first time or not
		    var firsttime = true;
		    
		    //Variable setting the expiry days of the cookie stored
		    var m_expire_days = 30; 
		    
		    var ShowMenuFlag = true;
		    
            var pageCount = 0;
		    
		    var bKeyDown  = true;
		    
		    var lastScrollPosition = 0;
		    
		    var bFirst = true;
		    
		    var bShowGridUpdateProgress  = false;
		    var bShowReadingPaneProgress = false;
		    
		    var bAddToBasketClicked = false;
		    
		    var m_nSelectedIndex = 0;
		    
            var GridCreated = function( sender )
            {          
                grid = "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid";
                
                var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();
                
                pageCount = parseInt( masterTable.get_pageCount() );
                if( pageCount > 1 )
                    ResizeAfterResponse();
                else
                    Resize();
                //timer = window.setInterval("RefreshSelectedRow()", 300);
                RefreshSelectedRow();
                //Fix the size of the grid after it is created. Added to fix grid resizing issue after sorting and grouping
                if( document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid_GridData" ) != null )
                {
                    document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid_GridData" ).className = "SearchResultsGridGridData";
                }
                
                //Set the expand-collapse column width in mozilla firefox 3.0.5 and above to fix the widening of grid columns
                if( navigator.userAgent.indexOf( "Firefox/3" ) != ( -1 ) )
                {
                    var arr = navigator.userAgent.split( "/" );
                    if( ( arr[arr.length-1].length == 3 ) && ( arr[arr.length-1] == '3.0' ) )
                    {
                        //Browser is firefox 3.0 not apply the fix
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        try
                        {
                            grid.MasterTableView.ColGroup.Cols[0].style.width = "10px";
                            var x = document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid_ctl01_Header" );
                            x.getElementsByTagName( 'colgroup' )[0].Cols[0].style.width = "10px";
                        }
                        catch( e )
                        {/*alert("catch");*/}
                    }
                } 
                setscrollbar();
            }
            
	    	var GridKeyDown = function( e )
	    	{
	    	    var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();
	    	    m_nSelectedIndex = masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0]._itemIndexHierarchical;
	    	    //alert(masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("ID"));
	    	    
                var retValue = true;
                var key      = window.event ? e.keyCode : e.which;

                if( key == 38 || key == 40 )
                {	    	        
	    	        bShowReadingPaneProgress = true;
                    bShowGridUpdateProgress  = false;
                    bKeyDown = true;
                
                    if( key == 40 )
                    {
                        if( m_nSelectedIndex != masterTable.get_dataItems().length - 1 )
                        {
                            masterTable.get_dataItems()[m_nSelectedIndex].set_selected(false);
                            m_nSelectedIndex = parseInt(m_nSelectedIndex) + 1;
                            
                            masterTable.get_dataItems()[m_nSelectedIndex].set_selected(true); 
                            SetCookie( "SelectedIndex", m_nSelectedIndex, m_expire_days );
                            __doPostBack( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid", m_nSelectedIndex );
                            //To implement Google Analytics Event Tracking for Job 'View' When user selects the Job with the KeyBoard shortcuts.
                             if(typeof _gaq != 'undefined')
                             {
                                
                                var jobID=masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("ID");
                                var jobTitle=masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("JobTitle");
                                
                                _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Job', 'View', jobID +' - '+ jobTitle]);
                             }
                             
                            retValue = false;
                       }
                    }

                    if( key == 38 )
                    {
                        if( m_nSelectedIndex != 0 ) 
                        {
                           masterTable.get_dataItems()[m_nSelectedIndex].set_selected(false);
                           m_nSelectedIndex = parseInt(m_nSelectedIndex) - 1;
                           masterTable.get_dataItems()[m_nSelectedIndex].set_selected(true); 
                           SetCookie( "SelectedIndex", m_nSelectedIndex, m_expire_days );
                           __doPostBack( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid", m_nSelectedIndex );
                            //To implement Google Analytics Event Tracking for Job 'View' When user selects the Job with the KeyBoard shortcuts.
                           if(typeof _gaq != 'undefined')
                           {
                                var jobID=masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("ID");
                                var jobTitle=masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("JobTitle");
                                
                                _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Job', 'View', jobID +' - '+ jobTitle]);
                           }
                           
                           retValue = false;
                        }
                    }
                    setscrollbar();
                    SetLastScrollPosition();
                    return false;
                }
                return true;
            }
            
            function setscrollbar()
            {
                //Setting scroll position
                var grid = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" );
                var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();
                if ( masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0] )
                {
                    var rowElement = masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].get_element();
                    //get the main table scrollArea HTML element
                    var scrollArea = grid.GridDataDiv;
                    if( scrollArea )
                    {
                        if( bKeyDown )
                        {
                            //check if the selected row is below the viewable grid area
                            if( ( rowElement.offsetTop - scrollArea.scrollTop ) + rowElement.offsetHeight + 20 > scrollArea.offsetHeight )
                            {
                                //scroll down to selected row
                                scrollArea.scrollTop = scrollArea.scrollTop + ( rowElement.offsetTop - scrollArea.scrollTop ) + ( rowElement.offsetHeight - scrollArea.offsetHeight ) ;
                                lastScrollPosition = scrollArea.scrollTop + ( rowElement.offsetTop - scrollArea.scrollTop ) + ( rowElement.offsetHeight - scrollArea.offsetHeight ) ;
                                                
                            }
                            //chck if the selected row is above the viewable grid area
                            else if( ( rowElement.offsetTop - scrollArea.scrollTop ) < 0 )
                            {
                                //scroll the selected row to the top
                                scrollArea.scrollTop = rowElement.offsetTop;
                                lastScrollPosition = rowElement.offsetTop;
                            }
                            bKeyDown = false;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            scrollArea.scrollTop = lastScrollPosition;
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                SetFocusToGrid();
            }
            
            
	    		    
            var RefreshSelectedRow = function()
            {
                try
                {
                    var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();
                    
                    if( ( masterTable.get_dataItems().length > 0 ) )
                    {
                        var nSelectedIndex = getCookie( "SelectedIndex" );
                        if( nSelectedIndex )
                        {
                            m_nSelectedIndex = nSelectedIndex;
                            
                            if( parseInt( m_nSelectedIndex ) <= parseInt( masterTable.get_dataItems().length ) )
                            {
                                if( 0 != masterTable.get_selectedItems().length )
                                {
                                    masterTable.get_dataItems()[ masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0]._itemIndexHierarchical ].set_selected( false );
                                }
                                masterTable.get_dataItems()[ m_nSelectedIndex ].set_selected( true );
                            }
                            else
                            {
                                if( 0 != masterTable.get_selectedItems().length )
                                {
                                    masterTable.get_dataItems()[ masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0]._itemIndexHierarchical ].set_selected( false );
                                }
                                m_nSelectedIndex = 0;
                                masterTable.get_dataItems()[ m_nSelectedIndex ].set_selected( true );
                                SetCookie( "SelectedIndex", m_nSelectedIndex, m_expire_days );
                            }
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            masterTable.get_dataItems()[m_nSelectedIndex].set_selected( true );
                            SetCookie( "SelectedIndex", m_nSelectedIndex, m_expire_days );
                        }
                    }
                    setscrollbar();
                }
                catch(err)
                {
                    setTimeout( "RefreshSelectedRow()", 300 );
                }
            }
	    		    
            var RowCreated = function( row )
            {
//               if(row.Index == 0)
//                {
//                    selectedRow = row;
//                }
                //Resize();
            }

            var RowClicked = function( sender, args )
            {
                SetLastScrollPosition();
                            
                m_nSelectedIndex = args.get_itemIndexHierarchical();
                //alert(m_nSelectedIndex);
                SetCookie( "SelectedIndex", m_nSelectedIndex ,m_expire_days );
                
                bShowReadingPaneProgress = true;
                bShowGridUpdateProgress = false;
                __doPostBack( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid", m_nSelectedIndex );
                //To implement Google Analytics Event Tracking for Job 'View' When user click the job.
                if(typeof _gaq != 'undefined')
                {
                    var jobID=args.getDataKeyValue("ID");
                    var jobTitle=args.getDataKeyValue("JobTitle");
                    _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Job', 'View', jobID +' - '+ jobTitle]);
                }
            }   

            var RowContextMenu = function ( sender, e )
            {
                if( ShowMenuFlag == true )
                {                    
                    var evt = e.get_domEvent();
                    
                    var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();

                    var menu = ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_GridContextMenu;
                    menu.Items[0].SetValue( 'GridContext' );
                    menu.Items[1].SetValue( 'GridContext' );
                    menu.Items[2].SetValue(' GridContext' );
                    menu.Show( evt );
                }              
            }

            var ShowMenu = function ()
            {
                var menu = ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_GridContextMenu;
                menu.Items[0].SetValue( 'ReadingPaneContext' );
                menu.Items[1].SetValue( 'ReadingPaneContext' );
                menu.Items[2].SetValue( 'ReadingPaneContext' );
                
                var Flag = "False";
                if( Flag == "True" )
                {
                    menu.ShowAt( document.body.clientWidth - 165, WindowHeight() - GetNeededBodyHeight() - 7 );
                }
                else
                {
                    menu.ShowAt( document.body.clientWidth - 165, WindowHeight() - GetNeededBodyHeight() + 30 );    
                }
            }

            var gridpaneresized = function( sender )
            {
                //fix sizing again
                Resize();
                if( gridpaneloaded )
                {
                    //Store the width of the pane in cookie when it is resized.
                    SetCookie( sender.get_id(), sender.get_width(), m_expire_days );
                }
                gridpaneloaded = true;             
            }
            
            //The following two functions prevent the gridpane from resizing while resizing the window.
            //Before resizing the splitter set the minimum and maximum width of gridpane as current width and height
            var splitterbeforeresize = function( sender, eventArgs )
            {
                splitterresizing = true;
                if ( eventArgs.get_newWidth() != null )
                {
                    var middlePaneWidth = sender.getStartPane().get_width();
                    var middlePane = sender.getStartPane(); //retrieve the middle pane
                    middlePane.set_minWidth( middlePaneWidth ); //set minWidth = current Width --> no decrease
                    middlePane.set_maxWidth( middlePaneWidth ); //set maxWidth = current Width --> no increase
                }
                
            }
            
            //After the splitter is resized, set the minimum and maximum width to defaults to enable resizing
            var splitterresized = function( sender, eventArgs )
            {
                var middlePane = sender.getStartPane();
                middlePane.set_minWidth( 200 ); //set to minimum value: minWidth = 200
                middlePane.set_maxWidth( 10000 ); //set to default value: maxWidth = 10.000
                splitterresizing = false;
                if( !firsttime )
                {
                    adjustlastpanewidth( 1 );
                }
            }
            
             //Setting the width of the panes after the splitter is loaded
            var SplitterLoaded = function( sender )
            {
                if( sender )
                {
                    splitter = sender;
                }
                
                if( bFirst )
                {
                    var prm = Sys.WebForms.PageRequestManager.getInstance();
                    prm.add_initializeRequest( InitializeRequest );
                    prm.add_endRequest( EndRequest );
                    bShowGridUpdateProgress = true;
                    bShowReadingPaneProgress = true;
                    document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlReadingPane" ).style.display = "none";
                    document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlGrid" ).style.display = "none";
                    bFirst = false;
                }
                
                SetApplyViaEmailLink();
                SetFocusToGrid();
            }
            
            function sendajaxrequest()
            {
                __doPostBack( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid", "" );
            }
            
            var DescriptionPaneResized = function( sender )
            {
                if( !splitterresizing )
                {
                    if( firsttime )
                    {
                        adjustlastpanewidth( 2 );
                        firsttime = false;
                    }
                }
                
                if( pageCount > 1)
                    ResizeAfterResponse();
                else
                    Resize();
            }
            
            var adjustlastpanewidth = function( addtowidth )
            {
                if( splitter )
                {   
                    var endpane = splitter.getPaneByIndex( 2 );
                    var secondpane = splitter.getPaneByIndex( 1 );
                    try
                    {
                        secondpane.setVarSize( secondpane.getVarSize() + addtowidth );
                    }
                    catch( err )
                    {
                    }
                }
            }
            
            //This function is for closing the radmenu while resizing the splitter
            var panegridbeforeresize = function()
            {
                var menu = ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_GridContextMenu;
                menu.Show( false );
                menu.Hide();
            }
            
            var MenuItemClick = function( sender, args )
            {
                bShowGridUpdateProgress = false;
                
				//Added on 10-02-2009 
                //When the 'Apply Now' menu item is clicked it shows an alert -
                //only if the Apply Via Email is configured for the portal.
                if( ( args.Item.Text == "Apply Now" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "FR-Apply Now" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "Postulez d√®s maintenant" ) )
                {
                    var Flag = "False";
                    if( Flag == "True" )
                    {
                    
                        ShowSendMailMessage();

                    }
                    else
                    {
                        
                    }
                }
				//Modified on 10\02\09
                //openradwindow() function is used for open a radwindow while clicking "Tell a Friend" menu
                 if( ( args.Item.Text == "Share this Job" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "FR-Share this Job" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "En parler √† un ami" ) ||(args.Item.Text == "(F)Share this Job") )           
                {
                     openradwindow('radwindow','#41182A','SharethisJob.aspx',490,185,'Tell_a_friend.gif',args.Item.Text);
                     //OpenPopupWindow( 'SendToFriend.aspx', 695, 460 );
                     ///OpenPopupWindow( 'SharethisJob.aspx', 500, 180 );
                }
                 //openradwindow() function is used for open a radwindow while clicking "Printable View" menu
                if( ( args.Item.Text == "Printable View" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "FR-Printable View" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "Aper√ßu avant impression" ) )
                {
                    //openradwindow('radwindow','#41182A','JobPrintPreview.aspx',890,600,'job16_info.gif','Job Details');
                    OpenPopupWindow( 'JobPrintPreview.aspx', 750, 550 );
                }
                
                if( ( args.Item.Text == "Add to Basket" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "FR-Add to Basket" ) || ( args.Item.Text == "Ajouter au panier" ) )
                {
                    bAddToBasketClicked = true;
                }
            }
			
			function ShowSendMailMessage()
            {
               alert( 'If you have an email client like Outlook installed on your computer, an email will now open automatically so you can apply with your current resume. If you are using a web mail client, see the detailed instructions at the bottom of the job description with information on how to apply by email.' );
               //To Implement Google Analytics Script When Apply Via Email Without Registering Checked.
                var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();
                        if(typeof _gaq != 'undefined')
                             {
                                
                                var jobID=masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("ID");
                                var jobTitle=masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0].getDataKeyValue("JobTitle");
                                
                                _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Job', 'Apply', jobID +' - '+ jobTitle]);
                             }
            }
            
            function InitializeRequest( sender, args ) 
            {   
                try
                {
                    ShowMenuFlag = false;
                    
                    RefreshSelectedRow();
                    setscrollbar();
                    
                    if( bShowReadingPaneProgress )
                        document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlReadingPane" ).style.display = "none";
                    
                    if( bShowGridUpdateProgress )
                        document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlGrid" ).style.display = "none";
                }
                catch(err)
                {
                }
            }
            
            function EndRequest( sender, args )
            {
                RefreshSelectedRow();
                if( args._response._aborted )
                {
                    return;
                }
                else
                {
                    SetApplyViaEmailLink();
                    
                    if( bShowReadingPaneProgress )
                    {
                        document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlReadingPane" ).style.display = "block";
                        bShowReadingPaneProgress = false;
                    }
                    
                    if( bShowGridUpdateProgress )
                    {
                        document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlGrid" ).style.display = "block";
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        bShowGridUpdateProgress = true;
                    }
                    
                    //fix sizing again
                    if( pageCount > 1)
                        ResizeAfterResponse();
                    else
                        Resize();
                    
                    setscrollbar();
                    
                    try
                    {
                        var err = args.get_error();
                        if ( err != null && ( ( err.name == 'Sys.WebForms.PageRequestManagerTimeoutException' )||( err.name == "Sys.WebForms.PageRequestManagerServerErrorException" ) ) )
                        {
                            args.set_errorHandled( true );
                        }
                    }
                    catch( eeee )
                    {
                    }
                }
                SetFocusToGrid();
                
                if( bAddToBasketClicked == true )
                {
                    bAddToBasketClicked = false;
                    bShowGridUpdateProgress = false;
                    window[ "ctl00_NavigationControl_NavigationPanelRadAjaxManager" ].ajaxRequest( "" );                    
                }
                
                ShowMenuFlag = true;
            }
            
            function ColumnResized()
            {
                if( pageCount > 1 )
                    ResizeAfterResponse();
                else
                    Resize();
            }
            
            function SetFocusToGrid()
            {
                try
		        {
	                var griddata = document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" );
	                
	                if( griddata != null )
	                {
	                    document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).focus();
	                }
	                
		            var element = document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid_GroupPanel" );
		            if( element != null )
		            {
		                document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid_GroupPanel" ).focus();
		            }
		        }
		        catch(e)
		        {
		        }
            }
            
            function SetApplyViaEmailLink()
            {
                try
                {
                    var Flag = "False";

                    if( Flag == "True" )
                    {
                        
                        document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_GridContextMenu_m0" ).href = document.getElementById( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_hiddenlabel" ).value;
                    }
                }
                catch(e)
                {
                }
            }
            
            function SetLastScrollPosition()
            {
                try
                {
                    var grid = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" );
                    var masterTable = $find( "ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" ).get_masterTableView();
                    if ( masterTable.get_selectedItems()[0] )
                    {
                        //get the main table scrollArea HTML element
                        var scrollArea = grid.GridDataDiv;
                        if( scrollArea )
                        {
                            lastScrollPosition = scrollArea.scrollTop;
                        }
                    }
                }
                catch(e)
                {
                }
            }
            
            function SetScrollAfterGrouping()
            {
                bKeyDown  = true;                        
                setscrollbar();
            }
            
            function SetAddToBasketStatus()
            {
                bAddToBasketClicked = true;
                bShowGridUpdateProgress = false;
            }
            
            function SetGridUpdateProgressStatus()
            {
                bShowGridUpdateProgress = false;
            }
            
		/*]]>*/
    </script>

		<div id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_updatepnlGrid">
									
		        <div id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid" tabindex="1" class="RadGrid RadGrid_Default" onkeydown="GridKeyDown(event);">

									<div id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid_GroupPanel" class="grouppanelcss" style="color:White;width:100%;">
	<table id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_SearchResultsGrid_GroupPanel_TB" class="rgGroupPanel" border="0" style="width:100%;border-spacing:0;border-collapse:separate;">

			<tr>
				<td><table border="0" style="width:100%;border-spacing:0;">

                <span id="ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder_ReadingPaneContainer_VacancyText" style="text-align:justify;color:Black"><P><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>We are seeking a Test Software Engineer to join our growing team.&nbsp; Get on board today and play a role in shaping the way people will be interacting with the world tomorrow!</FONT></P><P><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><STRONG>Five Things Our Employee Handbook Won't Tell you</STRONG></FONT></FONT></P><BLOCKQUOTE style="MARGIN-RIGHT: 0px" dir=ltr><P><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2     face=Tahoma><STRONG>Why you're right for this job:</STRONG>&nbsp; As a Test   Software Engineer, you will own a broad set of feature areas and product an   you'll take it on with ease.</FONT></FONT></P><P><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2     face=Tahoma><STRONG>Keep walking if:</STRONG>&nbsp; You can't bring a product   from concept into mass production.</FONT></FONT></P><P><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2     face=Tahoma><STRONG>Fringe benefits:</STRONG>&nbsp; You have experience with   high volume world class design and manufacturing techniques for consumer   electronic products.</FONT></FONT></P><P><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2     face=Tahoma><STRONG>Nerd Alert:</STRONG>&nbsp; You would consider yourself a   robotic wizard.</FONT></FONT></P><P><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2     face=Tahoma><STRONG>It's not all puppies and rainbows:</STRONG>&nbsp; If you   are an introvert, you must know you will be working with our mechanical,   electrical, firmware, software, design verification and software quality   engineers.&nbsp; This is a collaborative environment.</FONT></FONT></P></BLOCKQUOTE><P><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><STRONG>Because Life is Better With Bullet Points</STRONG></FONT></FONT></P><P><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><STRONG>Job Duties &amp; Responsibilities</STRONG></FONT></FONT></P><UL>  <LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2   face=Tahoma>Develop and implement a world class test platform for board-level   and product-level for digital, optical, RF and acoustic   systems</FONT></FONT></DIV>  <LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2   face=Tahoma>Complete integration of test commands into a test   architecture</FONT></FONT></DIV>  <LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2   face=Tahoma>Integrate test system into an MES / Shop floor   system</FONT></FONT></DIV>  <LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2   face=Tahoma>Create new test SW modules based on test methodologies defined by   Development Engineering</FONT></FONT></DIV></LI></UL><P><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><STRONG>Skills &amp; Qualifications</STRONG></FONT></FONT></P><UL>  <LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>A   minimum of 10 years combined experience</FONT></FONT></DIV>  <LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>BS   degree in Computer or Electrical Engineering or equivalent field.&nbsp; MS a   Plus</FONT></FONT></DIV>  <LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2   face=Tahoma>Knowledge of OOP and scripting languages (C++, C#,   etc)</FONT></FONT></DIV>  <LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2   face=Tahoma>Proficiency with LabView preferred, demonstrated ability to   quickly pic up other test frameworks and development   languages</FONT></FONT></DIV>  <LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2   face=Tahoma>Experience with machine vision and image processing SW a   plus</FONT></FONT></DIV>  <LI><DIV><FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT size=2   face=Tahoma>Knowledge of communication and networking protocols and database   access a plus<BR></DIV></LI></UL></FONT></FONT></span></td>

(function IIFE(dataLayer) {
	var mySearchExperience = isSearch() ? "" : window.localStorage.getItem('search_algorithm');
    var searchAlgorithm = isSearchRelatedPage() ? mySearchExperience || 'none' : 'none';
    dataLayer.push({
            "talentNetworkDID": "TNHV0NZ6JLYRVGX9JC4H",

            "template_ID": "premium",
            "search_experience": searchAlgorithm

})(window.dataLayer);


function isSearch() {
    return window.location.href.match(/\/search/g)
}
function isSearchRelatedPage() {
    if(window.location.href.match(/\/job\//g)) {
        return document.referrer.match(/\/search/g);
    }

    return window.location.href.match(/\/search|\/ApplyFinish\//g)
}

Before providing any personal information to outside parties, please verify the following: A) all legitimate Stryker recruiter email addresses end with ‚Äú@stryker.com‚Äù and  B) the position described is found on our careers site at careers.stryker.com.</i></small>

    <!-- Left Column -->
    <div class="jdp-left-column col-md-8 col-md-pull-4">
        <!-- Job Description -->
        <div id="jdp-job-description-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-description-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Description</h2>
    <br>Responsible for maintaining clinical and technical expertise for all MAKO products. You will provide both verbal and written clinical or application support to international and domestic end users, Field Service Engineers, Clinical Training, all Sales personnel & Distributors. You will be responsible for working with other departments to ensure that current and future products meet all service, quality and performance requirements. Additional work with Sales, Customer Advocate and Marketing to ensure customer satisfaction as well as Engineering and Product Marketing to develop demonstration tools to display MAKO products.<ul><li>Maintains the highest level of MPS certification in at least one application.</li><li>Maintains tier 1 field service engineer (FSE) training.</li><li>Maintains Segmentation Specialist certification for all available applications.</li><li>Provide support and expertise in service department development projects.</li><li>Forecasts and maintains inventory for all products developed by Clinical Application Support.</li><li>Maintains all Clinical Support tools and machinery per required guidelines.</li><li>Identifies, defines and drives development of new tools, processes and procedures required to support new and current product demonstration.</li><li>Acts as a subject matter expert for support of MAKO products.</li><li>Performs centralized segmentation and implant planning.</li><li>Responds immediately to Clinical/Application questions and inquiries from Field Service Engineers (FSEs), Customer Service Representatives (CSR), all Sales personnel and Distributors via telephone, fax, email, and on-site at customer locations.</li><li>Maintains accurate records of all support related activity in the service business management system.</li><li>Assists with root cause investigations as requested by Department Management.</li><li>Participates in exploratory testing and other engineering verification and validation activities to familiarize with new products and provide input on product improvements, serviceability, and potential customer support occurrences.</li><li>Drafts and distributes Customer Support Bulletins to the field on relevant topics.</li><li>Develops, tests and implements tools or programs connected with segmentation support.</li><li>Supports and coordinates lifeIMAGE LISA installations.</li><li>Supports the company‚Äôs remote site visit initiative by maintaining equipment, providing technical support and attending Far/Near End sites as necessary.</li><li>Maintains Clinical Application Support documentation and handles Engineering Change Notices (ECNs) as required.</li><li>Uses knowledge of Linux based RIO applications to trouble shoot application issues</li><li>Disseminates issues and potential trends requiring investigation by internal resources.</li><li>Performs other duties, as needed, to assist Department Management.</li></ul>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Job Requirements -->
        <div id="jdp-job-requirements-section">
            <div class="jdp-job-requirements-card content-card">
    <h2 class="content-card-header">Job Requirements</h2>
    <ul><li>Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Mechanical Engineering, Biomedical engineering or related engineering discipline.</li><li>2+ years of mechanical design experience required. 3-5 years of experience preferred. Experience with SolidWorks required.</li><li>Demonstrated a high degree of technical proficiency, excellent problem solving skills, and analytic ability. </li><li>Demonstrated excellent computer skills (strong understanding of Microsoft Office, Robotics and navigation experience preferred).</li><li>Demonstrated strong verbal and written communication skills required; must remain calm under pressure with excellent interpersonal skills.</li><li>Demonstrated presentation skills preferred.</li><li>Available by cell phone except during approved time off, emergency personal situations, etc.</li></ul>
</div>

        </div>
        <!-- Desktop Apply Now Section-->
        <div id="jdp-bottom-apply-section">
            <div class="jdp-bottom-apply-card content-card">
    <div class="row">
        <div id="jdp-bottom-apply-company-logo-col" class="col-sm-3">
            
        </div>
